title: Bounty Star
author: Bounty Star
created_time: December 22, 2022, 08:20:02 PMLast edit: May 23, 2024, 02:11:00 PM by Bounty Star

comments.author: Mr__ZACK
comments.body: Bountystar, one of the original Bitcointalk managers, has executed each of his campaigns flawlessly. He has some artistic talent and also creates campaign signatures. The most trusted bounty manager I've ever seen.

comments.author: Bounty Star
comments.body: Quote from: Mr__ZACK on December 25, 2022, 07:07:21 PMBountystar, one of the original Bitcointalk managers, has executed each of his campaigns flawlessly. He has some artistic talent and also creates campaign signatures. The most trusted bounty manager I've ever seen.Thanks for your great feedback.

comments.author: Unknown Op
comments.body: Bounty Star is the most trusted campaign in Bitcointalk Forum and this manager is very honest and they always work with integrity. I respect them from the bottom of my heart for working with this integrity.

comments.author: Bounty Star
comments.body: Quote from: Unknown Op on December 27, 2022, 09:50:55 AMBounty Star is the most trusted campaign in Bitcointalk Forum and this manager is very honest and they always work with integrity. I respect them from the bottom of my heart for working with this integrity.Thanks for your feedback about Bounty Star

comments.author: Lainta
comments.body: Great Bounty Manager in Bitcointalk Forum I have been working with Bounty Star for a couple of years now and he is always reliable when dealing with campaigns. I would highly recommend his services to anyone looking obviously most people already know that since he handles so many.

comments.author: Bounty Star
comments.body: Quote from: Lainta on December 29, 2022, 02:32:31 PMGreat Bounty Manager in Bitcointalk Forum I have been working with Bounty Star for a couple of years now and he is always reliable when dealing with campaigns. I would highly recommend his services to anyone looking obviously most people already know that since he handles so many.We appreciate your comments.

comments.author: TOXIC-ZY
comments.body: Bounty Star Manager is very good very responsible and very hard working manager.  May you move towards your success in the future.

comments.author: JMBitcointernational
comments.body: Since in joined the forum I have read about signature campaigns and bountystar has actually stand out to be unique and reliable, with responsible managers who have the interest of the workers at heart  and also place their campaign with utmost trust.however, I have been working so hard to rank up my account so that I can have the opportunity to work with this wonderful managers whenever they have an open slot for application. Thanks for being a good campaign manager .
